name: RemoveSellerCommissions
description: This endpoint removes a seller comission on the selected category.

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account that belongs to the marketplace. All data extracted, and changes added will be posted into this account.

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

sellerId.description: A string that identifies the seller in the marketplace. This ID must be created by the marketplace.

categoryId.description: ID of the category in which the comission was applied
